hero.name: Jaime Villanueva
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer & Mobile App Developer
hero.description: Specialized in creating modern and scalable web experiences and mobile applications using the latest technologies

about.title: Get to know me!
about.description_p1: I'm Jaime Villanueva, a FullStack developer specialized in web and mobile design and development. My approach combines solid front-end experience to create attractive interfaces, with back-end skills to build functional and dynamic solutions.
about.description_p2: I develop cross-platform mobile applications with React Native for iOS and Android, using an offline-first approach with backend synchronization and dual database architecture (server and local SQLite). I offer complete solutions that include dynamic menus, management systems, ERPs, client areas, e-commerce and payment gateways. I also manage content for social media, improving companies' online visibility.
about.description_p3: My goal is to transform ideas into successful digital products for both web and mobile devices. Explore my projects and contact me to take your vision to the next level.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: My Recent Work
projects.description: A selection of my most outstanding projects
projects.page_description: Welcome to my web development project portfolio! Each project showcases my skills, creativity and dedication to deliver quality web solutions.
projects.description_full: Explore my projects and discover the wide variety of websites I have created and developed. Each project has a detailed description and links so you can explore further.
projects.description_cta: Let yourself be surprised by what I can do for you!

frases-marcos-alcon.description: MarcosGoWeb is an elegant web application built with Go that displays a collection of phrases and poems by Marcos AlcÃ³n. The application presents the content in a beautiful interactive book format with page-turning animations, creating an immersive reading experience. Developed as a special gift for my grandfather's 95th birthday.

0.title: Interactive book reader
0.description: A web application showcasing Marcos AlcÃ³n's phrases and poems. A project created for my grandfather's 95th birthday, compiling the phrases he has been writing. The web app features an interactive book reader with page-turning animations. The site is responsive with exceptional UI and UX design.

tour-to-valencia.description: Tour To Valencia is a modern multilingual (English/Spanish) web application built with Remix and React that allows users to discover, explore and book tours and experiences in Valencia, Spain. The platform offers a smooth booking experience with integrated payment processing through PayPal and Stripe, email confirmations and a complete administration panel to manage bookings and tour content.

0.title: Multilingual booking system
0.description: Complete booking platform in English and Spanish that allows users to intuitively explore and book tours. Includes advanced filter system, search by dates and categories, and complete management of the booking process.

1.title: Integrated payment processing
1.description: Complete integration with PayPal and Stripe for secure payment processing. Support for multiple payment methods, automatic email confirmations, and refund management from the administrative panel.

2.title: Complete administration panel
2.description: Administrative management system that allows creating, editing and managing tours, viewing booking statistics, managing clients, configuring prices and availability, and generating detailed sales reports.

guillermo-fernandez-nutricion.description: Website to advertise nutritional consultation services and increase client acquisition. Allows clients to make an initial consultation through a contact form. Responsive design adaptable to desktop, tablet and mobile sizes. Developed with Astro for the front end and PHP for the contact form backend.

0.title: Professional website for nutritionist
0.description: Modern and professional website designed specifically for nutrition services. Includes informative sections about services, methodology, client testimonials, and contact information. Optimized to convert visitors into potential clients.

1.title: Integrated contact system
1.description: Custom contact form that allows clients to request an initial consultation. Includes data validation, automatic confirmation emails, and notifications to the professional for quick follow-up.

2.title: Responsive and optimized design
2.description: Fully responsive design that perfectly adapts to mobile devices, tablets, and desktop. Optimized for loading speed and SEO to improve search engine visibility and user experience.

alqueria-villacarmen.description: Creation of website to promote Alqueria Villa Carmen, a restaurant and event venue. It stands out for displaying the Day Menus, Weekend Menus and wine list, in addition to allowing online reservations. Includes a reservation manager with functions such as daily reservation limit, email confirmation and reservation administration.

0.title: Online reservation system
0.description: Integrated reservation platform that allows customers to book tables online. Includes date, time, number of guests selection and special preferences. Automatic email confirmation system and real-time availability management.

1.title: Dynamic menu management
1.description: Management system that allows updating daily menus, weekend menus and wine list from an administrative panel. Changes are automatically reflected on the website without requiring technical knowledge.

2.title: Reservation administration panel
2.description: Complete tool for reservation management including calendar view, configurable daily limits, table and schedule management, occupancy statistics, and notification system for restaurant staff.

car-hub.description: Discover our website dedicated to presenting the Car Hub software, a car buying and selling portal. The software functionalities are highlighted, emphasizing their virtues and utility for our clients. Developed with the latest technologies in HTML and PHP, it offers a responsive design that adapts to any device.

0.title: Software presentation website
0.description: Professional website designed to showcase the Car Hub software features and functionalities. Includes detailed descriptions of software capabilities, screenshots, and information about benefits for dealerships and end users.

todo-list.description: Complete task management application developed with Next.js 15, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS 4 and PostgreSQL. Offers user authentication, task management with a drag & drop system, calendar integration, and multilingual support. The application allows creating, editing, deleting and marking tasks as completed.

0.title: Advanced task management
0.description: Complete task management system that allows creating, editing, deleting and organizing tasks with ease. Includes drag & drop functionality to rearrange tasks, priority assignment, due dates, and customizable categorization.

1.title: User authentication and profiles
1.description: Secure authentication system with registration, login, and personalized profile management. Each user has their own private workspace with customizable settings and saved preferences.

2.title: Integrated calendar view
2.description: Complete calendar integration that allows visualizing tasks by dates, planning long-term projects, and getting an overview of workload. Includes notifications for upcoming due tasks.

3.title: Multilingual support
3.description: The application is available in multiple languages, allowing users from different regions to use the platform in their native language. Language switching is instant and user preference is saved.

cat-store.description: Web application for an online cat store developed with PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Includes authentication system, session persistence through cookies, product catalog with filters, shopping cart, user profile management, purchase history, administration panel and responsive design.

0.title: Complete online store
0.description: E-commerce platform specialized in cat products with complete catalog, category system, advanced search filters, persistent shopping cart, and optimized checkout process to maximize conversions.

1.title: User management and profiles
1.description: Complete user registration and authentication system with customizable profiles, purchase history, wish lists, shipping address management, and account preferences. Includes password recovery and email verification.

2.title: Administration panel
2.description: Complete administrative tool to manage products, categories, orders, users, and sales statistics. Allows adding, editing and deleting products, managing inventory, processing orders, and generating detailed reports.

3.title: Persistent cart and checkout
3.description: Shopping cart system that maintains selected products between sessions using cookies. Simplified checkout process with automatic shipping calculation, discount application, and order confirmation via email.

centro-neuro-expresion.description: Modern and accessible website for an early intervention center focused on children from birth to six years old. Provides comprehensive information about specialized services in four key areas of development: Cognitive, Linguistic, Prenatal and Sensorimotor Intervention.

0.title: Professional website for early intervention center
0.description: Modern and professional website designed specifically for an early intervention center. Includes detailed information about services, work methodologies, professional team, and specialization areas in child development.

1.title: Specialized services information
1.description: Complete section dedicated to explaining intervention services in the four main areas: cognitive, linguistic, prenatal, and sensorimotor. Each service includes detailed description, methodology, and benefits for child development.

2.title: Accessible and responsive design
2.description: Website developed with web accessibility principles to ensure all families can easily access information. Includes intuitive navigation, adequate contrast, and responsive design for all devices.

menustudio-ai.description: MenuStudio AI is a comprehensive SaaS platform that leverages artificial intelligence to generate professional food photography for restaurants and hospitality businesses. Built with a modern tech stack including React + Vite frontend and Elysia.js backend on Bun runtime, it offers text-to-image generation, AI-powered editing, video creation, and multi-language support for 40+ languages. The platform includes a flexible credit-based pricing system with Stripe integration, real-time WebSocket updates for live processing feedback, content moderation with NSFW detection, and a comprehensive admin panel for analytics and user management.
menustudio-ai.type: Full-Stack SaaS Platform - AI Image Generation

0.title: AI Image Generation in <30 Seconds
0.description: Generate professional food photography from text descriptions instantly. No photographer needed, no expensive equipment, just describe what you want and MenuStudio AI creates it.

1.title: AI-Powered Editing in Seconds
1.description: Remove unwanted objects, enhance lighting, adjust colors, and perfect compositions with AI assistance. Fix 'almost perfect' photos without expensive editing software or design skills.

2.title: Turn Photos into 4K Videos
2.description: Transform static images into engaging cinematic videos with realistic camera movements. 10x higher engagement compared to static images, generated in under 2 minutes.

3.title: Smart Gallery Management
3.description: All your content in one place, searchable, categorized, and accessible from any device. Never lose track of your visual assets or use the same photo repeatedly.

4.title: 40+ Languages for Global Reach
4.description: Complete interface translation including prompts, menus, and results. Reach international customers with culturally adapted content in their native language.

5.title: One-Click Distribution
5.description: Share via link, embed code, or direct download. Platform-optimized formats for social media, websites, and print. Collaborate with team members seamlessly.

6.title: Pay Only for What You Use
6.description: No monthly subscriptions, no commitment. Credits start at $10 and never expire. Transparent pricing: 2 credits per image, 14 per edit, 80 per video.

7.title: Live Progress Updates
7.description: Watch your images generate in real-time with WebSocket updates. See progress across all your devices simultaneously. Know exactly when your content is ready.

8.title: Intuitive Design, Zero Learning Curve
8.description: Glassmorphism aesthetics, spring-based animations, light/dark mode support. Powerful features that feel simple to use - maximum 3 clicks to any action.

9.title: Brand-Safe, Print-Ready Quality
9.description: NSFW content detection with three-strike ban system. High-resolution outputs optimized for print and digital. Trained specifically on gastronomy imagery.

0.title: High-Performance REST API Architecture
0.description: Built on Elysia.js with Bun runtime achieving 2.5x faster request handling than Node.js. Implements macro-based authorization for route-level access control, TypeBox validation for compile-time type safety, and plugin architecture for Prisma ORM, JWT sessions, WaveSpeed API, and Cloudflare R2 storage.

1.title: Real-Time Multi-Device Synchronization
1.description: WebSocket server supporting concurrent connections per user across multiple devices. Implements fire-and-forget async processing with background task manager, broadcasting status updates for image generation, credit balance changes, and admin notifications.

2.title: Secure Session-Based Authentication
2.description: Hybrid JWT + database session system with 30-day user sessions and 8-hour admin sessions. Supports OAuth 2.0 integration with Google and Apple Sign-In. Includes device session tracking for security auditing and instant session revocation for banned users.

3.title: Asynchronous AI Image Processing
3.description: WaveSpeed API integration with background polling mechanism (up to 5 minutes). Implements pre-deduction credit strategy with automatic rollback on failure, retry logic (max 3 attempts), and timeout cleanup to prevent zombie processes.

4.title: AI-Powered Content Safety
4.description: OpenAI Moderation API integration with configurable thresholds for adult content, violence, and explicit material. Fire-and-forget processing pattern allows immediate user access while moderation runs asynchronously in background.

5.title: Progressive Three-Strike Ban Enforcement
5.description: Atomic database transactions for ban creation, session revocation, and BannedUser table updates. Prevents re-registration via email/deviceId tracking. Includes appeal system with admin review workflow.

6.title: Multi-Currency Payment Processing
6.description: Stripe Checkout Sessions supporting 39 locales with European Central Bank exchange rates (updated daily). Handles zero-decimal currencies (JPY, KRW, VND) correctly. Implements idempotent webhook processing with signature verification and duplicate prevention.

7.title: Transparent Credit Economics
7.description: Pre-deduction pattern with automatic refunds on API failures. 3.33x markup over WaveSpeed API costs for sustainable margins. Includes timeout cleanup for abandoned processes and double-refund prevention with 'checked' flag.

8.title: Prisma ORM with MySQL
8.description: 15 models organized into 5 domains: Authentication (User, Session, BannedUser), Content (Image, BackgroundProcess), Payments (Transaction, StripeSession), Moderation (ModerationResult), and Administration (AdminActivityLog, DeviceSession). 40+ strategic indexes for query optimization.

9.title: Role-Based Administration Dashboard
9.description: Three privilege levels (SUPER_ADMIN, MODERATOR, VIEWER) with privilege escalation prevention. Features include 13-parallel analytics queries, revenue prediction with linear regression, device session tracking with UAParser, and comprehensive audit logging for compliance.

hero-budget.description: Hero Budget is a comprehensive personal finance management mobile application built with React Native and TypeScript. The app provides users with powerful tools to track income, expenses, recurring bills, and savings goals with real-time synchronization across multiple devices. It features a modern, intuitive interface with support for both light and dark themes, multi-language localization (20+ languages), and offline-first architecture with automatic cloud sync. The backend is powered by a robust Go microservices architecture deployed on VPS with NGINX reverse proxy, ensuring high performance and reliability.

0.title: Multi-Language Support (20+ Languages)
0.description: Full internationalization support with 20+ language translations including English (US, GB), Spanish (ES, MX, AR), Portuguese (PT, BR), French, German, Italian, Japanese, Chinese, Russian, Dutch, Danish, Norwegian, Greek, Hindi, and Catalan. Uses i18next for seamless language switching and localization with fallback support.

1.title: Social Authentication Integration
1.description: Seamless authentication via Google Sign-In and Apple Sign-In using OAuth 2.0 protocols. Supports traditional email/password registration with OTP verification for enhanced security. Implements secure token-based authentication with automatic session management and 'remember me' functionality.

2.title: Real-Time Cross-Device Synchronization
2.description: Advanced delta-sync protocol enables real-time data synchronization across multiple devices. Uses operation-based sync with device ID tracking to prevent duplicate operations. Background sync automatically runs when app returns to foreground, ensuring all devices stay up-to-date without user intervention.

3.title: Offline-First Architecture
3.description: Full offline functionality with SQLite local database supporting all CRUD operations without network connectivity. Automatic sync queue manages pending operations when connection is restored. Users can track finances seamlessly even without internet access.

4.title: Comprehensive Dashboard Analytics
4.description: Interactive dashboard displaying monthly financial summaries with income vs expenses visualization. Real-time balance tracking for both cash and bank accounts. Visual progress indicators for savings goals and budget adherence with color-coded status indicators.

5.title: Income Tracking & Management
5.description: Add and categorize income transactions with custom categories, payment methods (cash/bank), and detailed descriptions. View income history with filtering by date range, category, and payment method. Automatic balance updates and monthly income summaries with trend analysis.

6.title: Expense Management & Categorization
6.description: Track all expenses with custom categories, payment methods, and notes. Smart categorization system with emoji icons for visual identification. Expense history with comprehensive filtering and search capabilities. Automatic impact on cash/bank balances and monthly expense summaries.

7.title: Recurring Bills Management
7.description: Create and manage recurring bills with flexible payment schedules (monthly, weekly, quarterly). Set payment days, due dates, and duration in months. Track payment status for each period with quick pay functionality. Automatic reminders for upcoming bills and overdue notifications.

8.title: Savings Goals & Progress Tracking
8.description: Set personalized savings goals with target amounts and tracking periods. Visual progress indicators show percentage completion with color-coded status (on track, at risk, behind). Available balance vs goal comparison with detailed progress metrics and milestone celebrations.

9.title: Custom Category Management
9.description: Create unlimited custom categories for both income and expenses with emoji icons for visual distinction. Edit category names, types, and emojis at any time. Category type changes trigger automatic recalculation of all affected transactions and balances with cascade updates.

10.title: Dark Mode & Light Mode
10.description: Full support for both dark and light themes with smooth transitions. Theme preference persists across app sessions. Optimized color schemes for readability in all lighting conditions. Automatic theme application to all UI components and bottom sheets.

11.title: Go Backend Microservices
11.description: Backend built with Go using multi-module workspace (go.work) architecture. Separate microservices for budget management, savings, dashboard data, expenses, and incomes. RESTful API with structured error handling and context-based timeout management. Comprehensive logging for debugging and monitoring.

cv.title: CV
cv.summary: Experienced Full-Stack Software Engineer specializing in cross-platform application development, mobile app architecture, and scalable backend solutions. Proficient in developing robust microservice architectures, implementing DevOps practices, and managing server configurations with technologies like Nginx. Strong expertise in modern frameworks, cloud deployment strategies, and delivering high-performance applications across web and mobile platforms. Passionate about creating efficient, maintainable code and optimizing system performance through innovative technical solutions.
cv.footer_download_reminder: Don't forget to download this CV using the button at the top of the page.
